title: I'm James
paragraph: I was born and raised here in Calgary, and currently I'm a student at the University of Calgary where I am studying software Engineering. This summer I wanted to spend some time learning new languages and experimenting with developing some apps. You can find some of my projects below! When I'm not learning new things or working, I like to spend my time learning Japanese, playing hockey, working out, working on my car, and playing around with linux.
As far as software is concerned, my primary interests are in full stack web development, machine learning,
